snippet: The shares closed up by a record 14 percent in another reminder that a handful of companies have taken control of the technology industry.
abstract: Google's share price exceeds $1,000 for first time, another milestone in a remarkable assent from $85 public offering in 2004; enormous gains are a reminder of deep changes in technology industry, which is largely controlled by handful of web-based companies.
lead_paragraph: The shares closed up by a record 14 percent in another reminder that a handful of companies have taken control of the technology industry.

headline.main: Google Stock Tops $1,000, Highlighting a Tech Divide
headline.print_headline: Google Stock Tops $1,000, Highlighting A Tech Divide
